sourceOrganization.name: NIAID CARB-X Network
sourceOrganization.description: CARB-X is focused on the preclinical discovery and development and Phase 1 clinical trials of new antibacterial products (including therapeutics, vaccines, and diagnostics) to help address the threat of antibiotic resistance. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/carb-x
